name: shopinfo-app
title: Shopinfo.app
description: Identify Shopify themes from your current browser tab using shopinfo.app's database
author: trpage_dev

commands.name: what-shopify-theme-is-this
commands.title: Check What Shopify Theme Is This?
commands.subtitle: shopinfo.app
commands.description: Checks the website for relevant information output by Shopify themes for a matching theme name in shopinfo.app's database.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
